subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic gold medalists Robert Scheidt and Bruno Prada of Brazil won their second straight title in the men’s Star keelboat class at the world sailing championships in Perth, Australia.
snippet: The two-time Olympic gold medalists Robert Scheidt and Bruno Prada of Brazil won their second straight title in the men’s Star keelboat class at the world sailing championships in Perth, Australia.
